featured.text: The young generation in this country has shown less interest in factory work and other _____ labor jobs, such as house construction and fruit picking.
In working-class households, it was served with the main meal of the day, eaten when workers returned home after a day’s labor.

definition.zh_def: 勞動；工作，尤其是體力勞動。
definition.example: The workers put in long hours of labor to complete the project.
